node.title: Tears and prayers at funeral of four children who died in Werribee house fire
node.alt: A crowd carries a white coffin.
node.description: Mourners cried as the tiny coffins were carried overhead ofÂ family and friends before being laid to rest.
node.content:
["Hundreds have gathered at Flinders Memorial Park in Lara to mourn four children killed in a fire at their home in Werribee.", "Four white coffins were transported in three hearses from Al-Taqwa Mosque in Truganina\u00a0to the memorial park.", "Inside was 10-year-old Hamid, six-year-old Esin, three-year-old Nadir and one-year-old Elaine Turgem.", "Prayers were said and tears flowed as the coffins were carried overhead of family and friends before being laid to rest.", "", "
Four small white coffins were taken to the memorial park in three hearses.(ABC News: Christina Cavaleri)
", "A cousin, Mohmed Mougadam, who is also the chair of the Nuba community, said it was a sad day\u00a0for them and all of Australia.", "\"So [this loss] is the country's loss.\"", "Mr Mougadam said a\u00a0fundraiser to help the family had\u00a0reached nearly\u00a0$400,000.", "\"Australian people, they are great \u2026 they contribute financially, positively to the family,\" he said.", "Mr Mougadam said the family's father, Najm Eldin Turgem, had done everything to try to save his\u00a0children, but couldn't.", "He urged the community to get behind the family in the time ahead.", "\"They are not going to replace the four kids, but\u00a0\u2026 to support him socially.\"", "Al-Taqwa College principal\u00a0Omar Hallak said the whole community was affected by the tragedy.", "\"Really, we feel\u00a0sorry,\" he said.", "Mr Turgem was distraught at the funeral, seen being hugged and consoled\u00a0by fellow mourners.", "Police are still investigating the cause of the blaze\u00a0earlier this week in Werribee. Just one child, eight-year-old Ibrahim, survived the fire.\u00a0", "Flowers and toys have been left at the scene, where\u00a0neighbours, family and friends\u00a0paid tributes to the children calling them \"beautiful kids\".", "", "
Flowers\u00a0and teddy bears with messages of support were\u00a0left at the scene.(ABC News: Stephanie Ferrier)
"]
